__FORCETOC__
{{Cleanup}}
'''Food''' in {{Peak game}} can be consumed to reduce {{Hunger}} or gain {{Bonus}}. Some foods are {{Poison|label=poisonous}}, while others have additional effects, such as healing {{Injury}} or removing {{Heat}}.

Players can forage for various [[#Natural food|natural foods]], such as fruits, [[#Mushrooms|mushrooms]], or find [[#Packaged food|packaged food]] in [[Luggage]].

Food can be [[Cooking|cooked]] to double the amount of [[hunger]] restored and increase its [[bonus stamina]].

The tables below list every food item obtainable in the game, including their nutritional properties, weight, additional effects, and other notes.

== Natural food ==
Natural food can be found in almost every [[biome]]. It can be used to earn the {{badge|Naturalist}}. [[Mystical]] items, such as the {{Item|Cure-All}} and {{Item|Pandora's Lunchbox}}, are also safe for the badge.

== Packaged food ==
Packaged food is found inside [[Luggage]]. Consuming any packaged food prevents the players from earning the {{Badge|Naturalist}} in the same run.

== Mushrooms ==
Mushroom spawn locations are predetermined by the [[Island|seed]], although the same location may spawn a different number of mushrooms (including none) every time a run is started.

Mushrooms are considered natural food and thus are safe for the {{Badge|Naturalist}}.
